doc:
Harry Beaumont https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Harry_Beaumont 0 Harry Beaumont (February 10, 1888 – December 22, 1966) was an American film director, actor, and screenwriter. He worked for a variety of production companies including Fox, Goldwyn, Metro, Warner Brothers, and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. Harry Beaumont ( February_10_,_1888 – December_22_,_1966 ) was an_American_film_director , actor , and screenwriter . He worked for a_variety of production_companies including Fox , Goldwyn , Metro , Warner_Brothers , and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer .
